anime.description: Terry, an orphan who grew up in a foreign land, embarked a long journey to find his own kind. Along the way, Terry made friends with others who are also traveling for their own purposes. They banded together, exploring the distinctive geographies, magical species, as well as unique civilizations on different planets, collecting clues along with treasures left by the Creator, helping each other to overcome obstacles, defeating enemies, and unveiling the truth behind the legend of the Creator, leaving as folklore a epic story of love, friendship, and courage. Source: u17
